descriptions.description: This reinforcing loop accelerates team growth as experienced core developers mentor others, increasing the promotion rate and expanding the core team, which further amplifies mentorship capacity.
This reinforcing loop directly strengthens the core team by increasing the promotion rate through mentorship, creating a self-reinforcing cycle of leadership development.
This balancing loop stabilizes the core developer count by counteracting growth with natural attrition, such as burnout or career changes, preventing unlimited expansion.
This balancing loop regulates the pool of experienced contributors by promoting them to the core team, which naturally limits its own growth and seeks a stable size.
This balancing loop governs the onboarding process as new contributors who skill up graduate to experienced roles, preventing an indefinite accumulation of novices.
